jcr:root.jcr:description:
Stacking kit.
Fits Dryers: DE6060P, DE6060G, DE5060G, DE5060M, DE4060M
Fits Front Loaders: WH8560P, WH8560J, WH7560Pm WH7560J, WH8060P, WH8060F
jcr:root.jcr:title: Stacking Kit Vented Dryer
jcr:root.featureDescription: [,Fruit and vegetable quality can be maintained at the right humidity and temperature level. The Humidity Control System\, together with the cool and consistent temperature delivered by ActiveSmart™ Technology\, creates the perfect microclimate in each produce bin. Two humidity control slides offer settings for both fruit and vegetables to retain optimal moisture and freshness.,Uninterrupted wide-open spaces and numerous shelving options enable easy customisation for different uses. Quality extension runners allow you to slide out trays fully for easy loading and unloading in the fridge and freezer. The storage bins are also removable\, making food preparation and cleaning easier.,These fridges adapt to suit your lifestyle by streamlining food preparation and organisation with SmartTouch controls\, flexible shelving and storage options and slide out bins and trays.]
jcr:root.splFeatures:
Cleaning
Easy clean drip tray  
Dimensions
Overall height of product 1068
Overall width of product 900
Overall depth of product 480
Max height of decorative chimney flue (mm) 1036
Width of decorative chimney flue (mm) 220
Depth of decorative chimney flue (mm) 200
Height of control panel/handle 32
Size of air outlet 150
General Features
Able to be recirculated  
Controls Soft touch buttons
Easy to reach controls at front of unit  
Lighting 2 x 20W Halogen
Installation accessories
Charcoal filters  
Chimney extension  
Ducting accessories  
Performance Features
Air movement m 3/hr (max) 863
Decibel rating (dBA) max 65
Number of fan speeds 3
Type of fan Centifugal
Warranty
1 year parts & labour warranty

asset0.featureDescription: This machine has a cycle to suit every type of load including Allergy, Delicate and Sheets. Select a cycle with the easy to use SmartTouch™ control dial.

asset1.featureDescription: The large 22lb capacity is ideal for larger families and can wash bulky items with ease.

asset2.featureDescription: Eco-Active™ boosts soil removal while saving energy. Its unique technology recirculates water and detergent through the clothes, rapidly removing stains, dirt and killing bacteria.
